law.catch_line: Inspection time limit for certain vehicles brought into State.

text.section:
Sec. 30-397. Inspection time limit for certain vehicles brought into State.
The owner of any motor vehicle brought into this State for the first time and which is required to be registered under the provisions of State law and required to be inspected shall have such vehicle inspected within ten (10) days from the date on which it was first brought into the State and shall have the certificate of inspection affixed thereto within such ten (10) day time limit.
